ValidationRule.description: Ensures that approval status is only controlled by the approval process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "PersonalInformationChange" && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Name change") && ((ISPICKVAL(Status, "Approval") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( ChangeApprovalStatus__c, "In approval"))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Approval")) && ISPICKVAL( ChangeApprovalStatus__c, "In approval")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Moving in and out of approval status is controlled by the approval process.
